entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to zero by morning. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Periods of snow beginning near midnight. Risk of freezing drizzle. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h early this evening. Temperature rising to zero by morning. Wind chill minus 14 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 10 January 2023
